original_title: Les Contes de Jodo - Contes philosophiques
overview: These are initiation tales of A. Jodorowsky, tales and legends adapted from ancestral traditions, from all continents, and drawing their source from the heart of Jewish, African and Oriental traditions. Imagine real characters shot in Chinese shadow, encrusted in drawn sets. Add a 2D animation, bewitching music, and the unique voice of Alejandro. The result will be a mixture, where distant legends mix with mystery, poetry, and magic.
tagline: Fairy tales told by Alejandro Jodorowsky
title: Jodorowsky's Phylosophycal Tales
